title: 43 dev tips in 45 minutes
description: Are you a Business Central developer looking to refresh your knowledge? Fasten your seatbelts and focus with us on 43 simple but powerful tips to help you work smarter and faster. Learn how to write better code, find and fix problems more easily, and create custom solutions that work well for your users. We will cover useful AL programming tips, tricks to save time in VS Code, ideas to make your work more efficient, and a couple of jokes. Whether you are new to Business Central development or have experience, these tips will help you increase code quality and build great solutions.

title: A multisite project is more creating a product than a project
description: In this session, we'll explore why a multisite BC rollout is not just a project, but in many ways a product development effort, especially in the early stages. You'll learn how the initial phase of harmonizing processes, stabilizing requirements, and building reusable components resembles the lifecycle of a software product far more than that of a classic IT project. We'll discuss: - The critical shift in mindset required from project teams and stakeholders - Why a "template-first" approach is essential for scalability - Lessons learned from large international rollouts - How to balance standardization with local flexibility If you are involved in international BC implementations â€” whether as a consultant, project manager, or internal stakeholder â€” this session will help you rethink your approach and build BC solutions that scale effectively across the enterprise.

title: Actionable Copilots: Empowering AI Agents to Automate Business Processes with Power Platform
description: Most AI chatbots in business today are limited to providing static answers. They can't do anything - they can't update CRM records, send notifications, or automate tasks. This leads to disconnected user experiences and missed opportunities for operational efficiency. As organizations adopt AI copilots across customer service, internal support, and operations, the demand is shifting from passive Q&A bots to intelligent agents that can take action across systems. This requires tight integration with business data and tools like Dynamics 365, Microsoft 365, and third-party systems. Without this, AI remains just a novelty, not a driver of value or ROI. How - Tools & Features to Solve It: In 2025, Microsoft Copilot Studio introduced the Tools pane, a centralized interface for adding actions and data sources to your chatbot. These features empower Copilots to not just talk, but to actâ€”automating tasks like submitting service tickets, scheduling meetings, or logging data into your CRM in real time. In this session: - Learn how to connect Copilot Studio to Dynamics 365, Power Automate, and external systems to build end-to-end business processes within your chatbot. - Discover how generative AI can intelligently decide which action to take, including asking for missing inputs dynamically during the conversation. - Gain practical experience designing Copilot workflows that go beyond answering questions - by performing actions that deliver measurable business value.

title: Admitting your code sucks makes you a better dev
description: What makes a good developer? While there are many qualities, Henrik Helgesen and Luc van Vugt emphasize one in particular: the importance to learn from mistakes. They believe that having the courage to admit when your code isn't the best solution is crucial. A solution that worked years ago might not be effective today, especially with the constantly evolving BC platform. Through engaging examples, Henrik and Luc will demonstrate how fixing mistakes has made them better developers and teammates. They will also explore how AI has become a modern peer providing lightning fast feedback on their code. Their presentations are always thought-provoking and lively, and this session promises to be no different. Although they might not be as elegantly dressed as in Vienna, their content will undoubtedly shine.

title: Advanced coding for OGs
description: OGs, or Original Gangsters, are once skilled in C/AL and NAV, but now find AL and BC a bit challenging due to many new language and platform features to learn. In this session, we'll cover coding topics that might be unfamiliar to many of you. These areas are not often used, sometimes because they are needed only for specific cases, and mostly because different approaches are used to solve problems. They might also be new to you, and you may lack the time or knowledge to explore them (Copilot, anyone?).

title: Agentic AI and the Frontier Firm: Rethinking ERP in the Age of Intelligence
description: In 2025, AI is no longer a buzzwordâ€”it's a battleground. From Microsoft's bold vision of the â€œFrontier Firmâ€ to Apple's sobering critique in The Illusion of Thinking, the AI landscape is evolving faster than most businesses can adapt. This session dives deep into the rise of Agentic AI and its transformative impact on ERP, with a sharp focus on Business Central. But we won't stop there. We'll explore how other ERP giants are reimagining AI in their platforms, and how their strategies compare to Microsoft's. We'll also examine the broader AI ecosystem: Apple's stumbles with Apple Intelligence, Microsoft's missteps with Windows Recall, and the rise of physical AI from Tesla and Figure. You'll leave with a clear understanding of where AI is headed, what it means for your customers, and how to position yourself at the forefront of this revolution. Expect bold insights, real-world examples, and a roadmap for navigating the next wave of intelligent ERP.

title: AI for the Over 40: From Skeptic to Evangelist - A Business Leader's Practical Journey
description: Remember when "digital transformation" meant moving from Excel to ERP? Today's AI revolution demands an even bigger leap, and for many business leaders over 40, it feels like being asked to learn a new language while running a marathon. This isn't another theoretical AI presentation filled with buzzwords and hype. Instead, join a fellow business leader on a journey of AI discovery. In this candid 45-minute session, discover why your years of business experience aren't obsolete - they're your secret weapon in the AI age. Learn why treating AI like Google is your biggest mistake, and how thinking of AI as your smartest team member changes everything. Through real-world examples, you'll see how AI can transform your work as a prerequisite to changing how your teams and clients work. Key takeaways include: â€¢ The mindset shift that turns AI from a frustrating toy into an indispensable business tool â€¢ Why you have a unique advantage in the AI revolution â€¢ Practical AI ideas you can implement immediately (really) â€¢ How to lead AI transformation across the organization â€¢ The journey from AI anxiety to organizational leadership This session is for leaders who have built successful practices based on experience and relationships, who understand that technology should serve business (not vice versa), and who suspect AI is important but haven't seen AI drive organizational transformation yet. No coding required.

title: AI in Asset-Intensive Industries: Scaling Expertise and Driving Business Central Adoption
description: In industries like Manufacturing, Facility Management, and Energy, the impact of AI will be transformative, but only if solutions address the real demands of operations. For AI to deliver value in maintenance and field service, it must be accessible, practical, and embedded in systems already in use. Maintenance teams need tools that simplify daily work such as creating work orders and tracking requests, while operations managers require support for building preventive plans and deploying predictive maintenance strategies powered by IoT and machine learning. The goal is to extend the expertise of experienced staff by scaling their knowledge through data-driven decision-making. For Microsoft Solutions Partners, the opportunity is clear: deploy AI trained on operational and maintenance dataâ€”not generalized ERP, finance, or HR inputs. Solutions that meet users where they work improve adoption, drive productivity, and make Business Central even more essential to daily operations. With mobiMentor AI, built into TAG Mobi EAM for Microsoft Business Central, Verosoft is delivering a new layer of intelligence that ensures cleaner maintenance data, boosts engagement, and expands ERP value for asset-intensive industries. Meet the Verosoft expert at Directions EMEA 2025 to see how AI designed for maintenance is already increasing user stickiness in Business Central and how it will soon optimize complex workflows as data flows through BC, turning AI from concept into enabler.

title: AI in Business Central: From Talking with Data to Smarter Decisions
description: AI isn't the future of Business Central â€” it's happening right now. In this session, we'll show how AI apps transform the way finance teams work: from conversational reporting in AI Financial Intelligence to automated close and audit validations in AI Chief Accountant Assistant. You'll see how AI turns everyday ERP data into insights, charts, and explanations you can act on instantly â€” without spreadsheets, manual reporting, or waiting for IT. Key takeaways: How conversational analytics let you talk with your data and get instant answers Why dynamic charts make trends and risks clear at a glance How AI-driven checklists bring control and confidence to month-end and audit prep Practical examples of AI in action inside Business Central Join us to explore how AI can cut through the noise, simplify finance, and give decision-makers the clarity they need.

title: AI Integration in Business Central apps: Managed vs Custom AI - What You Need to Know
description: When implementing AI solutions in your Business Central extensions, you face a critical decision: adopting Microsoft's Managed AI service or custom Azure OpenAI deployments? This choice impacts costs, control, and monitoring capabilities of your AI solution. During this session, we'll go in-depth into both approaches. We will discover what the new Microsoft's Managed AI service is, its integration with AL and when it's the optimal choice to adopt. Then we'll also explore the adoption of custom Azure OpenAI deployments, including setup, configuration of an AI layer, advanced tips for AI performant architecture (like routing models) and advanced monitoring techniques. You will learn practical implementation strategies, cost optimization methods, and best practices for tracking AI usage per customer. I will also share custom monitoring tools and frameworks you can immediately adopt in your development practice. Whether you're building your first AI-powered extension or scaling existing solutions, this session provides the insights and tools needed to make informed architectural decisions and implement effective AI monitoring strategies.

title: AI Is Not Another Productâ€”It's a Business Transformation
description: AI and Copilot aren't just the next Microsoft solutions to resell or implementâ€”they mark a seismic shift in how value is created, delivered, and monetized. This isn't another workload to bolt on. It's a full-scale business transformationâ€”just as disruptive as the shift to the cloud or the painful journey to SaaS that you may have just finished navigating over the last decade. Now, it's happening again. And this time, it's moving faster. In this provocative and eye-opening session, Sharka Chobot challenges Microsoft partners to confront a critical truth: monetizing AI isn't about technical readinessâ€”it's about business reinvention. Just as the cloud forced you to rethink pricing, packaging, and services, AI is now forcing you to reimagine your identity, revenue model, and go-to-market strategy. You'll explore: â€¢ Why treating AI like just another â€œsolutionâ€ may stall your growth or worse, put your future value at risk â€¢ The organizational shifts required to become an AI-first partner, not a legacy reseller in a new market â€¢ How to move beyond implementation projects to become a trusted AI advisor â€¢ Reinventing continuous-value AI services â€¢ The emotional resistance you and your clients must overcome to lead this transformation â€¢ How to re-establish trust, relevance, and recurring value in the age of Copilot This is not just a sessionâ€”it's your strategic reset. Come ready to rethink everything you thought you knew about selling, serving, and surviving in the AI era.

title: AI Orchestration: Building Multi-Agent Systems
description: The future of AI isn't just about single agentsâ€”it's about how multiple AI agents work together to solve complex problems. In this session, explore how AI orchestration enables intelligent, multi-agent collaboration using Copilot Studio, OpenAI, and external integrations. Learn how businesses can design AI ecosystems where agents communicate, coordinate tasks, and make decisions autonomously. We'll dive into real-world applications, such as automating customer service across multiple departments, managing end-to-end business processes, and enabling AI-driven decision-making at scale. You'll learn best practices for structuring multi-agent workflows, handling contextual memory, and ensuring seamless interactions between AI agents and human users. Through a live demonstration, we'll showcase how to design a multi-agent system that dynamically assigns tasks, processes information, and interacts with various APIs and databases. By the end of the session, attendees will have a clear roadmap to implement AI orchestration strategies, enabling smarter automation and more efficient business operations.

title: AI-Driven Page Scripting: Practical Use Cases for Dynamics 365
description: Discover the key to unlocking structured outputs with AI. This session focuses on a powerful, widely re-usable method for crafting prompts that produce precise, schema-specific results. Using Business Central Page Scripting YAML files as our example, we'll show you exactly how to guide large language models to generate output that's not just accurate, but deployable. Andy and Jose will take you beyond theory and into real-world applications. Through practical demonstrations, you'll see how this prompt engineering approach enables automation of routine tasks, improves data quality, and delivers intelligent, context-aware user experiences. From AI-powered data validation to predictive field population, this session will equip you with the tools to build smarter, more efficient Business Central solutions - and the skills to apply this prompting technique far beyond scripting.

title: AI-powered document processing: classification, content-based record creation and seamless matching
description: Discover the future of ERP automation with the brand-new Smart Processing feature for Document Central. This session will showcase how your business can save time and reduce errors by automatically classifying documents, generating records based on their content, and seamlessly matching them to existing data in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. Say goodbye to manual tasks and hello to intelligent automation!

title: AuthN & AuthZ in Power Platform: advanced platform functionality
description: Security is key! Cyberattacks are becoming more prevalent and visible, and systems are being breached. Yet, in many cases, security is still an afterthought in solution designs and architectures. Something that's to be done after the â€œuseful functionalityâ€ is developed... No longer! Join Yannick in this session, where he will explore all options to secure Power Platform at the platform level. He will show how Conditional Access Policies and Entra ID Security Groups can be leveraged for a better baseline security and then explore more advanced techniques as well as best practices for accessing records or handling secrets, using Key Vaults and Managed Identities. Whether you are a developer, technical consultant, or just interested in making your environments more secure, Yannick will make sure you will take home the resources to get started today.

title: Automating Standard Business Processes using Power Automate, Teams and Dynamics 365
description: In this session, I will show three common use cases for automation inside standard business processes, using Microsoft Teams, Power Automate and Dynamics 365. I will also explain how these use cases can be translated to connect to other accounting and ERP systems using PA along with additional steps you can utilize with SharePoint as well.

title: B2B Is Not an Excuse to Be Boring: 10 Marketing Moves Microsoft Partners Should Steal from B2C
description: Most Microsoft partners play it safe with B2B marketing - long whitepapers, jargon-heavy messaging, and campaigns no one remembers. Meanwhile, B2C and D2C brands are out winning attention, building emotional connections, and driving demand through bold, creative moves. The gap is only growing. 70% of B2B content goes unused, and 80% of buyers now expect a B2C-style experience - fast, personal, and emotionally engaging. Only 5% of B2B buyers are in-market at any one time, which means brand recall matters more than ever. This session shows Microsoft SI's and ISV's how to break out of the â€œsafe but forgettableâ€ playbook - and apply proven tactics from the innovative B2C marketing world to cut through the noise and drive results. You'll leave knowing how to: - Build a brand people remember, trust, and want to buy from - Launch campaigns that spark inbound leads and sales conversations - Inject energy, creativity, and confidence back into your marketing If you're ready to stop going through the marketing motions and start standing out, this is the session for you.

title: Bank feeds in Business Central: what your customers are missing
description: Join the session to see how Bankfeed automates financial statement imports and payment reconciliation, helping you to deliver a more complete Business Central solution. In this session, you'll discover a Business Central add-on, called Bankfeed, that connects to more than 12,300+ banks. You'll see the installation process, which literally takes minutes, and you'll get a feel for how the solution streamlines processes for companies with high transaction volumes and multiple bank accounts.

title: Barcode Integration in Business Central for Manufacturing and Warehousing
description: Discover the transformative power of inventory, shipping, and shop floor operations with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and barcode technology. This session highlights the integration of Insight Works' apps and mobile computing options for various operations. We will explore Insight Works' suite of apps, focusing on how their barcode functionality improves inventory tracking, shipment processing, and employee time management. â€¢ Explore the synergies of Business Central, Insight Works' apps, and barcode technology for optimized operations. â€¢ Understand the diverse mobile computing hardware options suitable for various business scales. â€¢ Learn about the crucial role of barcodes in improving inventory control, shipping efficiency, and shop floor time collection. â€¢ Gain insights into best practices for leveraging these integrated solutions.

title: Beyond the Buzz: What RAG with Vector Databases Really Looks Like in Business Central
description: A reality check on building RAG pipelines in ERP contexts, including what works, what doesn't, and what we might do differently next time. RAG is often sold as the future of enterprise AI: combine LLMs with vector search, and suddenly users can â€œtalkâ€ to their data. It sounds great, but what happens when you actually try to implement it in a structured ERP system like Business Central? In this session, I'll share what I've learned from developing a RAG-based prototype inside Business Central. The initial idea was simple: let users select tables and fields that should be semantically searchable, embed their values into a vector index, and connect them to a conversational AI assistant. In practice, the results were mixed. Some things worked well (especially with Copilot assistance in development). Other things, like whether this even needed vectors at all, are still up for debate. You'll learn: - How we built a configurable RAG prototype on top of Business Central - Why semantically matching JSON-structured ERP fields sometimes feels like the wrong abstraction - What to consider before jumping into embeddings and vector search - What I would change if I started again today This session is for technical builders who want more than just AI hype and are curious what happens when you move from cool demos to production constraints, user expectations, and actual data complexity in ERP.

title: Beyond the Checkbox: Navigating E-Invoicing Compliance in Europe
description: Discover how product partnerships power our strategy to make CoCounsel the marketâ€'leading legal AI assistant and elevate our legal suite. In this 45â€'minute breakout, our Product Strategy Director shares key approaches, real examples, and what's nextâ€”followed by an interactive Q&A to address your questions.

title: Beyond the Pioneering Days: Transitioning from Software Development to Product Development
description: With over 7,000 apps released for Dynamics 365 and Business Central, the pioneering days are behind us. The "get your apps on AppSource" Gold Rush is over, and now it's time to mature and stand out among the many diverse apps available. In this session, Abakion will share what we believe is crucial in moving from traditional software development to full-fledged product development. We'll use real-world examples to highlight the importance of market research, relevant domain knowledge, smooth onboarding, and a great user experience to help grow and maintain your app's user base. We don't claim to have all the answers, and we know there's still a lot to learn about what needs to be done and how to do it. But we're excited to share our ideas and assumptions with you, so you can learn from our journey. Why Attend: This session is a must-attend for app developers, product managers, and business leaders looking to move beyond the initial success of launching an app on AppSource. By focusing on the transition from software development to product development, you'll gain valuable insights and practical strategies based on Abakion's hands-on experiences. We'll emphasize that there is no silver bullet, but rather a continuous journey of learning and improvement. Join us to learn how to navigate the next phase of AppSource success and ensure your app stands out in a crowded marketplace.

title: Beyond Traditional Patterns: Event-Driven Architecture with Business Central
description: Move beyond point-to-point integrations and discover how to build resilient, scalable event-driven architectures using Business Central and the Azure Stack.

title: Boost efficiency with E-Docs in BC without complexity
description: The beauty of simplicity, an old saying which is the foundation of how we can help any company exchange E-Docs, in any setup. PEPPOL, X12, EDIFACT, customized formats etc. This session is designed for BC consultants and developers who want to make life easier for their customers by simplifying B2B integrations and related to E-invoice and supply-chain related features, sales and purchasing. FRUSTRATED WITH COMPLEX SETUPS? STRUGGLING TO MANAGE SALES, PURCHASING, INVENTORY, OR 3PL WORKFLOWS ACROSS DISCONNECTED SYSTEMS? TRY TO SIMPLIFY IT ALLâ€”DIRECTLY INSIDE BUSINESS CENTRAL? With NxM Connect, embedded into BC, you can concentrate on the internal processes. Advanced exchange of E-Docs is made easier for the end-user. PEPPOL/E-invoice can easily be assigned and NxM Connect is embedded into BC and will inform the end-user about required actions. Daily tasks become simpleâ€”no technical expertise needed. Two decades of experience has built NxM Business Solutions to become a leading solution and full-service provider with an exceptional Support Team at your hand for all editions of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.

title: Boosting Productivity with Copilot, Business Central, and Dataverse: A Smart Integration
description: Can you imagine having an army of digital assistants that understand your business, respond in natural language, and automate processes effortlessly? Stop imagining and come discover how artificial intelligence, through Copilot, is transforming the way we work with Dynamics 365 Business Central. In this fun and 100% hands-on session, we'll explore how Copilot, combined with Microsoft Dataverse and Copilot Studio, enables the creation of intelligent agents that connect to your data, process requests, interact with users, and automate complex tasks. You'll see live how Dataverse acts as a bridge between applications, enriching the information available to Copilot and enabling advanced scenarios like predictive analytics, report generation, or integration with the Power Platform. We'll also share best practices to ensure the security, privacy, and quality of AI-generated responses. If you're into automation, AI, or simply curious about the future of digital work, this session is for you. Get ready to discover how Business Central, Dataverse, and Copilot can work together to boost productivity and innovation in your organization.

title: Build CtrlBC - Your Action-Driven Copilot Agent for Business Central
description: It's time to move beyond basic Q&A bots. In this advanced, hands-on session, we'll build CtrlBC, a next-generation Copilot Agent designed to integrate deeply with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central. Built using Microsoft Copilot Studio, CtrlBC doesn't just respond to prompts; it drives processes, initiates actions, and leverages the full power of the Microsoft ecosystem. We'll walk through designing a multi-functional Copilot that uses Dynamic Chaining, Power Automate, and Adaptive Cards to interact with Business Central data, automate tasks, and deliver meaningful results across platforms like Teams, websites, or Copilot for Microsoft 365. From interacting with structured data to sending context-aware communications and triggering process flows, CtrlBC will demonstrate how an AI agent can become a true extension of your operational workflows. Delivered by Tharanga Chandrasekara, Technical Lead and ten-time Microsoft MVP, and Steve Gichure, Founder and Technical Lead at Thamani Tech NZ, this session will energise your Power Platform journey and get you building smarter, faster, and better.

title: Build Your Company's AI Assistant - What We've Learned the Last 1,5 Years
description: AI is set to revolutionize nearly every aspect of business operations. However, instead of speculating about what "might change" and what "will be" possible in the future, we invite you to explore tangible, real-world applications - with more than 1,5 years of experience. In this session, we will showcase how we at Anvaigo have developed our personal AI assistant, "Tony", the AI squirrel. We will present our Top 5 Use Cases, demonstrating the significant benefits of utilizing AI with real, functioning examples: 1. Improve speed and quality of e-mail responses 2. Faster access to product and process knowledge 3. Make your team smarter 4. Optimize team processes 5. Rapid new employee training Following this, we will provide a comprehensive, straightforward guide on creating and setting up your company's AI assistant with Copilot Studio and ChatGPT, tailored to your specific business, product, and process information - at its challanges and how we have solved them. This guide includes best practices and valuable insights we've gathered along the way. We will delve into the two products Copilot Studio and OpenAI's Custom GPT, discussing the pros and cons of each. Forget the mundane tasks like "Summarize an email" or "Create (an ugly) PowerPoint presentation (without considering our Corporate Design)." Instead, immerse yourself in the practical, impactful applications of AI with live demos that illustrate genuine, effective use cases.

title: Building Apps Smarter: combining Generative Pages & Code Apps with proven practices
description: AI has taken over the development space, with vibe coding being all the rage. Code Apps and Generative Pages are Microsoft's answer to bringing vibe-coded (but also traditionally developed pro-code) apps into Power Platform, hosting them on the Power Platform runtime. In this session, Vivian and Yannick will take a closer look under the hood, finding answers to questions: What are these features, how do they work, what do they replace, and when do they make sense to use? Additionally, we have a proven development practice on Power Platform. How do we integrate Code Apps and Generative Pages into this practice so we can continue building robust and scalable solutions using all these new goodies? As solution architects, with Vivian bringing a functional angle to the platform and Yannick having a traditional developer background, they are perfectly placed to provide answers. Join them for a deep dive into Code Apps and Generative Pages, so we can avoid hallucinating into production!

title: Building Custom Agent using Copilot Studio
description: Copilot Studio is a powerful tool that can help you create conversational experiences with ease. It provides a simple, intuitive interface for designing and testing your chatbots. With Copilot Studio, you can create Copilot Agent and add topics which integrate with other Microsoft services like business Central, SharePoint and Power Automate. In this session, I will detail overview on Copilot studio and creating Custom Agents and will demonstrate how to create Custom Agents integrates with Services like SharePoint, Business Central and Power Automate using Copilot Studio. This will show how a Custom Agent can interact with humans to submit data to these services. I will also cover the steps to automate a business process using Agent flows. This session is ideal for beginners who want to learn how to interact with a bot to automate a business process.

title: Business Central Intelligence: Cut Your Reporting and Planning Time with AI-Powered Solutions
description: We all know the frustration of spending days on reports that should only take minutes to create. Or the inevitable headache of planning cycles that can stretch for months when you need to start budgeting and forecasting for next quarter right now. Business Central users across EMEA are changing how they handle reporting and planning with insightsoftware's practical self-service solutions with AI features and direct Microsoft integration. In This Session You'll discover: AI That Speaks Finance: Turn everyday questions into detailed reports. Your team doesn't need SQL trainingâ€”they just need to ask for what they want. Real-Time Excel Collaboration: Work with Business Central data directly in Excel Desktop or Excel Online. Your team can analyze and share insights from anywhere, using tools they already know in ways that work best for them. Self-Service Power BI Without the Wait: Use data already optimized for Power BI and let your non-technical business users create their own reports and dashboards. No more IT bottlenecks or external consultants. Planning Solutions in Days, Not Months: Deploy enterprise-grade planning structure in Power BI in a matter of days. We'll show you actual implementations running live. You'll see exactly how organizations gain a real-time reporting edge while giving their teams true self-service analytics. These aren't just demosâ€”they're proven solutions already changing how businesses work with Business Central data.

title: Business Central reports and documents: simple, fast, affordable.
description: Designing reports in Business Central can be simple. Forget RDLC and Word layouts, AL-coding, and the impossible search for experienced professionals. FORNAV solves these BC report design challenges: - 100 + standard reports - Drag and drop design, no coding required - Automatic report updates with new BC versions - Low implementation cost and time - Print any report to any device to any location - Access C:\ files and programs - E-invoicing - And moreâ€¦ Join us â€” newcomers and long-time friends alike â€” as we explore familiar features and new additions. Discover how FORNAV simplifies Business Central documents and gives you a powerful competitive edge.

title: Can I Optimize Bin picking for production with Copilot?
description: Before we do the final assembly of a product, we need to move items from the warehouse to the production lines according to the production schedule. The items must arrive before production starts. When there are a high number of configurations and customizations, this becomes a challenge. Complexity arises when you have different sizes of materials in various bins throughout the warehouse, and you need to "feed" the production line from different areas at different times. We can use a double-bin system for some of the items, but not for allâ€”so they need to be moved according to the schedule. If we have a large warehouse and need to prepare for more than one order at a time, there are different methods we can use, such as zone picking and batch picking. But today, when we calculate the picking process, are we truly getting the optimal picking strategy for our production? We have various algorithms to optimize the shortest path, like Dijkstra's algorithm or the nearest neighbor algorithm. Some of the bins may need to be split into different sections to support movement calculations for the items. The question is: Can we use Copilot to help us optimize inventory movements for production?

title: Can you train developers in 60 days? We tried.
description: What if, instead of training junior developers with courses and documentation, you just gave them a real project with real deadlines and two months to figure it out? In this session, I'll walk you through an experiment where we did exactly that. We assigned valuable, real-world work to complete beginners - no prior tech stack, just ambition and structure. It didn't go smoothly: vacations hit, priorities clashed, and some realized they didn't even want to code. But in the end, they gained practical experience, we got partial delivery, and future training became way easier. Why join? Because if you're responsible for growing talent, or becoming talent, you'll walk away with honest insights, hard-earned lessons, and a fresh approach to building developers who are more than just coders.

title: Chat with your data
description: In the era of AI, the ability to quickly and easily draw insights and answers from our data, is as important than ever, and being able to ask those questions in plain human language. In this session we'll uncover the possibilities of combining Microsoft Fabric with OpenAI, to enable scenarios like chatting with our data. We'll touch upon topics like the OpenAI API, prompt engineering, prompt flow and how to data model our data for easy consumption by the AI. Topics: - Open AI API - Prompt engineering in prompt flow - Data modelling for GPT After attending this session, you'll leave with an understanding of how to harness the power of Microsoft Fabric and OpenAI to revolutionize the way you interact with data.

title: Clean Code is Dead, Long Live Clean Code
description: For more than two years now, I have been evangelizing clean code, SOLID principles, and testable architecture. Then AI arrived, and I thought: "Who cares about clean code when machines can read, write, and maintain any code?" I was spectacularly wrong. After months of intensive vibe coding and letting AI write most of my code while I directed, reviewed, and fought with the results, I discovered that clean code isn't just still relevant: it's become absolutely critical for survival in an AI-dominated development world. This deep-dive session reveals why the very foundations we've been teaching for decades have become our lifeline in the age of artificial intelligence: - Why programming became AI's first conquest (spoiler: we were never as special as we thought) - How vibe coding simultaneously accelerates and sabotages your projects - The art of prompting AI into SOLID compliance and keeping it there - When to trust the machine and when to grab the wheel back - Why AI naturally produces spaghetti code and how to prevent it - The brutal truth about programmer relevance and how to secure your future (as short as that may be) Through real examples and battle-tested strategies, you'll learn to harness AI's power while maintaining the code quality that separates long-term winners from short-term survivors. Because in a world where anyone can generate code, only those who can generate good code will thrive.

title: Copilot Studio Zero to Hero: Build Copilot Agents connected to Business Central (No PhD needed!)
description: News Flash: You don't need to be an AL developer to build AI Agents (custom copilots) connected to Business Central data! In this workshop, I will take you from beginner to proficient in one day. All you need to bring is a laptop and an appetite for learning. You will learn how to create an Agent from scratch, experience how Instructions and Descriptions influence GenAI driven agents, work with different types of knowledge sources (Files, Websites, SharePoint, Dataverse, Bing Custom Search), create Actions and Power Automate Flows to work with Business Central, use Triggers for autonomous behavior, create Topics to orchestrate conversations, track performance and behavior with telemetry, and deploy your Agent to Teams, a website or within Copilot for Microsoft 365. For non-BC developers, I will also teach how you can quickly and easily create and publish custom APIs to interact with Business Central data. Start your AI journey with this workshop and you will be the office hero when you return from this event!

title: Customer Journeys in the Cloud: Creating Value Beyond Go-Live
description: Going live on Business Central Cloud is just the beginning. At Abakion, we believe that long-term customer retention depends on delivering instant value, ensuring availability, and staying relevant throughout the entire customer journey. To support this, we've developed a structured and scalable model based on four customer segmentsâ€”Complex, Active, Curious, and Dormantâ€”each with a tailored journey. Every journey is divided into seven clearly defined phases, and for each phase and segment, we've outlined specific actions and success criteria. This enables us to deliver the right engagement at the right time, based on the customer's actual needs, maturity, and potential. Our approach allows us to stay present and proactive across a growing customer base. It ensures that all customers experience valueâ€”whether highly engaged or more passive. Does this mean we follow a rigid framework? Not at all. The customer journey provides structure and a shared baseline that lets us adapt every interaction to the customer's needs. And gives us the clarity and capacity to deviate when it truly matters. In this session, we'll share how we scale our business to meet the growing number of cloud customers by operationalizing customer success through segmentation, automation, and service design. You'll learn how a structured journey model can help your team grow, stay close to customers, and turn cloud users into loyal, long-term partnersâ€”while building a foundation for sustainable success.

title: D365 Business Central Test automation - lets make it easy
description: Learn how you can turn your business processes into test cases in a minutes. After 13 years and 5 mln of test cases executed we are packing that lesson learned into easy to use product for every BC partner. Say goodbye to repetitive, tedious tasks and hello to intelligent automation.

title: Deep Dive into Report Objects and Layouts in Business Central
description: Join us for a deep dive into report objects and layouts in Business Central. We'll start with the basics of report objects. You'll get to know the different layout types available, like RDLC, Word, and Excel layouts, and how to pick the best one for your needs. Next, we'll get into the specifics of each layout type. You'll learn how to design and customize RDLC layouts for more complex reports, create professional-looking Word layouts for document-style reports, and use Excel layouts for data analysis. Throughout the session, I'll share practical tips and tricks to help you optimize your report designs and make your reporting processes more efficient. Key Takeaways: - Understanding the basics of report objects in Business Central. - Creating and modifying report objects. - Choosing the best layout types for your needs. - Creating professional-looking Word layouts. - Using Excel layouts for data analysis. - Tips and tricks for optimizing report designs. Join us and take your Business Central reporting to the next level!

title: Delivering BC in the Age of AI: Which Soft Skills Still Matter?
description: As AI tools become increasingly embedded in how we gather requirements, prototype solutions, and deliver Business Central projects, the skills we rely on as consultants are evolving. From AI-generated documentation to intelligent copilots guiding users in real time, the landscape of Dynamics 365 project delivery is changing fast. But while how we deliver is shifting, the why remains the same and it's still rooted in human connection. In this session, Andy and Phil will explore how AI is reshaping traditional workshop engagements. They will look at why soft skills like empathy, active listening, facilitation, negotiation, and stakeholder management remain essential, but now need to be applied in new and nuanced ways to make the most of the AI tools that are becoming part of everyday delivery. This talk will offer practical tips for consultants and project teams who want to harness AI without losing the human touch. You'll leave with a fresh perspective on how to create meaningful synergy between smart tools and soft skills and why your emotional intelligence might just be your most future-proof asset. Whether you're a functional consultant, project manager, or developer, if you're involved in delivering Dynamics 365 Business Central and supporting users through change and adoption, this session is for you.

title: Digitalizing Public Finance and Citizen Engagement Through Microsoft Cloud Solutions
description: Wise Municipality solution is a proven, scalable platform for the public sectorâ€”fully integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and enabling AI readiness for local governments. Powering 80% of Icelandic municipalities today, it modernizes budgeting, procurement, compliance, and service delivery while reducing manual work and increasing transparency. Designed to meet strict regulatory demands, the solution enables partners to expand portfolios with confidence and accelerate digital transformation in local government. In this session, we'll showcase a real Icelandic case study demonstrating how Wise Municipality drives efficiency, impact, and new revenue opportunitiesâ€”making it ready to deploy and easy to extend.

title: Do I Still Need You? (a.k.a. Do We Still Need Developers?)
description: At this conference, you'll hear the terms AI and Copilot mentioned hundreds of times. And just as often, questions might pop into your head: Will it take my job? Does it actually work? Is Copilot just good for tooltips? Why doesn't it work for me? In this (not entirely technical) session, we'll dive into these concerns and take a look at what the future might hold. We'll explore what it means to be a modern Business Central developer and whether this role is still essential. We'll also discuss: - What skills, beyond AL language, you and your team should focus on - How Copilot and other AI tools can support your day-to-day work (I will show that on my end-to-end example) - How to stay relevant and continue bringing value in a fast-changing environment Important: This won't be a one-way presentation. Bring your concerns, experiences, and ideasâ€”this session is a conversation, not a monologue.

title: Does document creation drive you mad?
description: If creating a document is more frustrating than functional, this session is for you. Every business needs to create documents. Too often, building new business documents can be a herculean task - from collecting the right data from multiple systems, editing the actual form, then figuring out how to get it to the right format into the right delivery mechanism (including e-invoicing) - it's a lot to manage. Join us to talk through real world examples and best practices for building and scaling document programs leveraging data from Dynamics 365 (F&O, CE and BC) and other business applications like Microsoft Office, SFDC, PDM, CMS, and other software systems.

title: EazyStock's Session
description: Delivering inventory efficiency and recurring revenue

title: Effective Requirements Gathering for Successful Business Central Implementations
description: Failing to gather accurate requirements can lead to costly delays, scope creep, and dissatisfied clientsâ€”risks that can jeopardize your Business Central projects and your reputation. In this critical session, Microsoft partners will learn proven methods to identify, document, and validate client needs before problems escalate. Discover essential techniques to avoid misunderstood requirements, misaligned solutions, and scope overrunâ€”common pitfalls that can threaten project success. Whether you're a newcomer or seasoned expert, missing these strategies could mean the difference between a smooth deployment and a costly failure. Don't leave your project outcomes to chanceâ€”arm yourself with the knowledge to deliver precise, effective solutions every time.

title: Elevate Efficiency through EDI, Supply Chain Optimization, and E-Invoicing Compliance
description: Want to process orders faster, reduce costs, meet e-invoicing compliance, and grow your business? Without EDI, managing orders can be slow and complex. In this session, SPS Commerce will show how full-service EDI for Microsoft Dynamics 365 simplifies operations, reduces manual work, and connects you to the largest retail network. You'll also learn how it helps meet new e-invoicing compliance standards introduced globally, which require electronic invoicing in specific formats. Whether you run a small business or lead supply chain operations, this session offers practical tips to boost efficiency, stay compliant, and build a stronger business.

title: Empowering Accessibility with AI through Copilot
description: Discover how AI and Copilot are reshaping accessibility, opening doors for more inclusive user experiences. This session will cover how businesses can leverage AI-driven tools within Copilot to make their platforms more accessible to users of all abilities, from real-time transcription and translation to content simplification and screen reader enhancements. You'll learn how Copilot can assist in creating an intuitive, universally usable interface that adapts to individual needs, allowing everyone to engage fully with digital content. We will explore practical applications, like voice-to-text conversions, language simplification, and personalized guidance, that empower users with diverse needs. This session will showcase real-world examples of how companies are implementing AI to improve accessibility, enhancing digital engagement and expanding their audience reach. Attendees will gain insights into how Copilot's tools can remove barriers, making information accessible and actionable to a broader spectrum of users. The session includes a live demo illustrating AI-driven accessibility features in action. This hands-on showcase will highlight key capabilities, such as adaptive interfaces and real-time support mechanisms, demonstrating how Copilot can deliver tailored accessibility solutions that benefit both end-users and organizations.

title: Excel Layouts Masterclass: Dust Off Your Excel Skills for Better Reports in Business Central
description: Everyone knows Excel and many love to hate it. But when it comes to reporting in Business Central, Excel Layouts are one of the most powerful features in the toolbox. While Excel empowers our customers to edit reports themselves, they often still expect us to build layouts that meet their business needs. In this session, we will take you from the basics of Excel Layouts in BC all the way to creative and unexpected use cases. We will explore advanced techniques on how to build clean, effective Excel Layouts using Hyperlinks, Translations, Power Query and more. Whether you are a consultant or developer, you will walk away with fresh ideas and a new appreciation for what Excel Layouts can do. *Note that this session focuses on what you can do inside Excel to create the final report design, not the AL development side of report definitions.

title: Expanding Business Central Page Scripts Beyond QA
description: Page Scripting in Business Central gives us a powerful way to simulate user behavior, but its YAML output is more than just a test file. Whether you're already using Page Scripts for testing or just getting started, discover how these YAML files can become structured automation assets you can reuse across testing, support, DevOps, documentation, and design. You'll learn how to: â€¢ Transform "customer can't process orders" support tickets into repeatable Page Scripts that validate entire workflowsâ€”eliminating "works on my machine" scenarios â€¢ Generate design specs, user guides, and test case documentation from real user flows â€¢ Use Page Scripts in CI/CD pipelines for smoke testing and regression Discover the workflow patterns and tooling integrations that can dramatically reduce support reproduction time and streamline cross-team workflows. Whether you're building a DevOps pipeline, scaling support, or writing functional specs, Page Scripts give you a new way to capture and reuse the truth of what users actually do.

title: Exsion + Business Central: Faster Insights, Happier Customers
description: Business Central delivers strong standard reporting, but customers often need more flexibility, speed, and tailored outputs. That is where Exsion Reporting comes in. With 20 years of experience and over 19,500 users, Exsion complements Business Central by enabling finance teams to build, format, and refresh reports directly in Excel with one click. No coding, no exports, just faster insights and reusable reports. For partners, this means higher customer satisfaction, quicker project delivery, and recurring revenue opportunities. Learn how Exsion integrates seamlessly with Business Central and AI to extend reporting beyond the basics.

title: Extending Business Central with Azure Services: A Developer's Guide
description: Business Central integrates with several Azure services that can extend your solutions beyond standard functionality. This session covers five key Azure integrations: Blob Storage for file management, Key Vault for credential security, Application Insights for monitoring, Azure Functions for .NET interoperability, and OpenAI Service for AI capabilities. I'll demonstrate the AL code patterns for each integration, explain when each service is most appropriate, and discuss implementation considerations including costs and performance.

title: Feedback, Please!
description: Feedback fuels growthâ€”but giving and receiving it isn't always easy. Why does feedback sometimes leave us confused, trigger defensiveness, or make the world feel darker? And why doesn't it always lead to meaningful change? This session flips the script on feedback. Instead of focusing only on how to give it, we'll explore how to receive itâ€”openly, skillfully, and without defensiveness. Using real examples, we'll dive into both sides of the feedback conversation. Here's what we'll cover: â€¢ Feedback Triggers: Why does feedback sometimes feel like a threat? And why do we react the way we do? â€¢ Receiving Feedback More Skillfully: Practical strategies to manage your reactions and navigate tough feedback moments with greater confidence and psychological comfort. â€¢ Delivering Brain-Friendly Feedback: Learn how to offer feedback that feels safe, reduces defensiveness, and fosters a growth mindset. Whether you lead, collaborate, or simply want to feel more comfortable in feedback conversations, this session will help you turn feedback into a powerful tool for growth.

title: Field Service + Business Central - The new perfect couple, or are they?
description: Microsoft have recently released the Field Service Integration app with Business Central. Lets understand how Dynamics 365 Field Service works with Business Central out of the box in this introductory session. We'll find out if the perfect couple are getting their relationship started on the front foot, or, is there already trouble in paradise? Field Service has been around for a number of years now with Microsoft, but it working with Business Central has always been a challenge due to no standard integration capabilities. But that has all changed. This session is ideal for those who want to understand a bit more about how Field Service works at a high level, and ultimately how it will (and won't) work with Business Central out of the box, as well as where you can expect to still need some enhancements. Basic understanding of the D365 Sales and Dataverse integration capability with Business Central will help for this session.

title: Field Service Management: Meeting Your Customers' Needs with AI-Powered, Best-in-Class Solutions
description: This session explores how our AI-powered, Business Central-integrated Field Service Management solution can help you meet your customers' expectations and win over new prospects. Attendees will learn how Praxedo enables organizations to: - Optimize field operations with AI-powered automatic scheduling - Provide remote assistance to support both customers and field teams - Empower field engineers with a mobile app for real-time access to tasks and data - Seamlessly integrate with Business Central with no development required Discover how implementing Praxedo in just a few months can transform your clients' service operations, helping them meet and exceed customer needs while giving you a competitive edge in the Business Central ecosystem.

title: Fight Club: Dynamics 365 BC vs Dynamics 365 FO
description: Dynamics 365 Business Central (BC) and Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (FO) stand as two options within Microsoft's suite of business solutions, each designed to cater to distinct business needs and scales. With over 20 years of experience in the Dynamics 365 space, transitioning from BC to FO projects, this session aims to demystify the core differences between these powerful platforms. "Fight Club: Dynamics 365 BC vs Dynamics 365 FO" is not just a comparison; it's an in-depth exploration into understanding which solution best aligns with specific customer requirements. Why does Microsoft not provide detailed comparisons? What makes each solution unique and how can you navigate these waters to advise your clients accurately? This session will offer a unique perspective on these questions, providing attendees with a step-by-step approach to developing their own guidance for distinguishing between BC and FO.

title: From Acquisition to Activation: How ISVs can Drive Real Partner Adoption.
description: Attracting partners is one challenge - getting them to actively sell your solution is another. In this session, we explore how ISVs can bridge the gap between partner acquisition and partner adoption. Drawing from in-progress academic research and hands-on experience at POS-ONE, the session shares early insights into why many partners stall after signing up, and what ISVs can do to support them beyond the onboarding email. We'll look at how clear, structured messaging and more intentional enablement processes can equip partners with the tools and confidence they need to position and sell effectively. The content is grounded in both theory and real conversations with partners - what holds them back, what they say they actually need to feel ready to sell, and what motivates them to engage. Whether you're building your partner channel or trying to improve partner outcomes, you'll leave with practical ideas, honest lessons, and a stronger understanding of how to move from sign-up to sell-through.

title: From Call to ERP: Integrated Customer Support with Dynamics 365 Contact Center and Business Central
description: In today's fast-paced business environment, customers expect immediate and seamless support, no matter which channel they use. This session demonstrates how Dynamics 365 Contact Center and Business Central can be combined to deliver a truly integrated customer service experience, eliminating the need to switch between systems. We'll walk through a real-world scenario: a customer calls to report a defective product. The call is routed through Contact Center, where the agent can instantly access Business Central data (orders, invoices, inventory,..) directly within the Dynamics interface. From the agent's panel, the product's serial number is verified, the issue is logged, and a return is initiated in Business Central, all without leaving the screen. Key takeaways: â€¢ How to embed Business Central data into Contact Center using Dataverse virtual tables â€¢Streamlining support workflows to reduce response times and operational errors â€¢Delivering a consistent, omnichannel experience across voice, WhatsApp, and more Whether you're a developer, consultant, or solution architect, this session will provide practical insights into building connected support experiences that leverage your Business Central deployment to delight your customers.

title: From Chaos to Clarity: Time, Billing & Projects the Simple Way
description: Managing projects can feel like an endless struggleâ€”late timesheets, slipping deadlines, and revenue lost to inaccurate or delayed billing. Too often, companies drown in spreadsheets, waste hours in status meetings, and still lack the transparency they need to stay on track. But it doesn't have to be this way. In this session, we'll dive into the real challenges of project operations and explore how to get control backâ€”by capturing time where the work happens, keeping budgets and progress visible in real time, and ensuring every hour worked can be billed without hassle. The result? Less chaos, more clarityâ€”and projects that run smoothly, profitably, and with far less stress.

title: From Chaos to Clarity: Visualize AL Architecture for Scalable Business Central Solutions
description: Are your AL projects becoming hard to manage as they grow? Discover how clear architecture can save your team time and headaches. We tried so many different approaches to visualizing architecture; flowcharts, UMLs, ERDs, and although they're great approaches, they can often end up too complicated or messy. There's a different light-weight framework that ensures simplicity: Simon Brown's C4 model - making it easier to share your architecture's intricacies, from code dependencies to interconnected services within the Dynamics 365 ecosystem. With the rise of AI-powered coding tools a well thought out architecture leads to a better set of prompts for the agents to work on and minimizes the risk of rework or even having to start from scratch again. Just because we're not typing the code doesn't mean there is no time and cost spent on prompting and reviewing, right? A good architecture in the beginning makes the work with the coding agents and the pipelines more productive and fun. Join this session to discover how the C4-model can transform your team's communication, ensuring success in building and maintaining scalable Business Central solutions. Learn practical insights from Christian, who uses this technique daily to bridge the gap between technical experts and business decision-makers. Ideal for AL developers, solution architects, and team leads working with Business Central.

title: From Chaos to Code: Building a Knowledge-First Development Workflow
description: Most development companies struggle with scattered documentation, inconsistent processes, and knowledge that lives only in people's heads. This is a 'Yes Copilot, but no fluff' session that walks through building a practical system where your company knowledge becomes the foundation for everything - from initial project planning to final release notes. You'll see how to create shared knowledge repositories that fuel both human decision-making and AI assistants, turning your DevOps wiki into a living resource that everyone can actually use. We'll cover the complete workflow: capturing requirements, transforming them into implementation plans, and connecting code changes to documentation updates automatically. This isn't about replacing developers - it's about creating systems that make good developers even more effective by giving them instant access to institutional knowledge and automated help with the repetitive stuff.

title: From Clicks to Automation: Maximizing Business Central Efficiency with Power Automate
description: Discover the fundamentals of connecting Business Central with Power Automate in this beginner-friendly session. Learn how to transform repetitive manual tasks into automated workflows, saving valuable time and reducing errors. We'll walk through the essential building blocks of Power Automate, demonstrate how to establish your first connection to Business Central, and showcase practical examples that you can implement immediately. Perfect for newcomers looking to take their first steps into the world of process automationâ€”no advanced technical knowledge required.

title: From Complex to Effortless: AI-Driven Item Configuration in 15 Minutes
description: In discrete manufacturing, item configuration can be a real bottleneck. Complex product variants, precise BOM setups, and consistent attributes are essential, but they can also eat up time. Creating room for errors, and slow down innovation. In our 15-minute ISV session, we'll show you how to turn that challenge into a competitive advantage and make your business fly. With Microsoft Copilot and our Item Configurator working together, you can configure items in Business Central faster, smarter, and with total accuracy. Simply describe what you need: â€œCreate a new item based on the standard aluminium frame but with a custom finish and updated dimensionsâ€ and let Copilot handle the heavy lifting. The result? Less manual work, fewer errors, and more time to focus on what really matters: designing, producing, and delivering better products. Join us and see how AI in your daily workflow can take you from manual configuration to market-ready, without missing a beat.

title: From Data to Decisions: How Consultants Can Use Telemetry in Business Central
description: In this session, we will explain how consultants can use telemetry in Dynamics 365 Business Central to bring more value to their clients, without needing to be a developer. From setup to real examples from projects, you will see how telemetry helps identify issues faster, improve user adoption, and provide data-driven recommendations. I will show how to run simple KQL queries, build dashboards tailored for consultants, and use Microsoft's free Power BI apps to monitor performance and usage. We will also talk about the cost of telemetry and how to keep it under control, so you can deliver insights without increasing project budgets. If you want to learn how telemetry can support your role as a trusted advisor and help your clients succeed, this session is for you.

title: From Hype to How: Your Playbook for the Future with Microsoft
description: The pace of change in technology has never been faster â€” and AI is at the heart of it. Join us for this exclusive session as we cut through the noise and reveal what's next for Microsoft Partners. Explore Microsoft's evolved solution areas and learn how to stay ahead, unlock new opportunities, and deliver real value to your customers. Whether you're an MSP, CSP, ISV or VAR, we will provide you practical insights, actionable strategies, and a clear view of the road ahead that will help you supercharge your business.

title: From Mobile Apps to Autonomous Field Operations: Built-In Compliance for the Last Mile
description: Field Sales, field service, and Warehouse operations often succeed at â€œgo-liveâ€ but become harder to control over time. At Directions EMEA, Dynamics Mobile will present its new approach for the last mile: a compliance and control layer that is built-in, not bolted on. We will share how our platform has evolved from mobile apps to an AI-consumable architecture that supports both frontline users and managers, while staying deeply integrated with Microsoft Dynamics 365. This session introduces the next stage of our journeyâ€”moving towards autonomous field operations, where compliance and governance run continuously, and AI assists in guiding actions and decisions.

title: From Overwhelmed to In Control: A Governance Compass for Microsoft's AI Platform
description: Tired of piecing together governance as you go? Introducing the AI Business Solutions Governance Compass, a hands-on framework created by Microsoft MVPs Jakub Bajla and Edit Kapcari. It's built from real-world experience to help you move beyond scattered controls toward confident, strategic governance, not just for Power Platform, but for Copilot Studio and Microsoft's evolving AI ecosystem. This session offers a first look at the framework's foundations, showing how proven Power Platform governance principles adapt as AI and Copilots enter the picture. We'll map your governance journey, highlight the maturity curve, and break down Microsoft's growing Copilot landscape (M365, Dynamics, Power Platform, Copilot Studio, Agents). You'll learn how to assess where you are today, what good governance looks like as AI enters the mix, and where to put guardrails around data, security, and user access. Whether you're an admin, developer, or business lead, you'll leave this session with a clear picture of what to focus on, how to reduce risk, and how to help your team grow their skills. Key Talking Points: â€¢ Assessing governance maturity for Power Platform and AI â€¢ What changes when you bring Copilot and Agents into the mix â€¢ Where to set smart guardrails for security and compliance â€¢ How to build a learning and upskilling roadmap for your team Demo: â€¢ Governance maturity model in action â€¢ Building your first Copilot Agent with governance guardrails

title: From Windows to Linux: Running Business Central the 'Wrong' Way
description: They say Business Central only runs on Windows. We say: why not challenge that? In this session, we'll take you through a bold experiment â€” running Business Central on Linux using Docker and Wine. No VMs, no emulation, just a refusal to accept that things must be done the way they've always been. We'll walk through how we got it working, where it got weird, and why it's more than just a tech stunt. Because here's the thing: this setup doesn't just work â€” it brings benefits. Faster test pipelines, fewer resource demands, and the freedom to run on lower-spec hardware. For local devs, build agents, and lean environments, this could open up a whole new world. If this is possible without official support, imagine what could be achieved if Microsoft made the Service Tier truly Linux-compatible. We're not just breaking the rules â€” we're asking if the rules still make sense. And who knows â€” could this even pave the way for full dev environments in Codespaces or devcontainers someday?

title: Future Talent in Business Central - A Shared Responsibility
description: To inspire and share concrete experiences on how we at Abakion work to attract and retain new talent - not as an HR project, but as a shared business responsibility. Our willingness to invest in our Graduate program comes from the experience, that we can develop new consultants with the right cultural fit, faster than we can source them. Our Graduates also supplies new learning opportunities for our senior consultants, who grow in skills and experience from developing the next generation. And it makes us proud to take part in making Dynamics 365 Business Central, Customer Engagement and the Power Platform attractive to the next generation. Focus areas: - Why is talent development a leadership task - How do we do it in practice? - How is the experience from a graduate perspective? - What have we learned?

title: Future-Proofing Treasury: How to Build a Modern Finance Stack with Microsoft Dynamics 365
description: Are you clients' finance teams spending countless hours on manual tasks, struggling with fragmented data, and lacking real-time cash visibility? In a world of increasing financial complexity, manual treasury processes are a major roadblock to growth. This session will demonstrate how Embat's seamless, real-time integration with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and Finance & Operations can help you deliver a unified, automated, and intelligent treasury solution. Learn how to eliminate manual bank reconciliation, centralise global payments, and provide your clients with the strategic financial insight they need to thrive. Discover a new opportunity to expand your Dynamics practice and deliver more value to your corporate clients.

title: Get Found (or Be Forgotten): How Microsoft Partners Must Rewire Their Website for the AI Era
description: You've worked hard to get discovered on Google and Bing. But in a world where prospects are increasingly using AI chat search tools such as ChatGPT, Copilot, Google Gemini, Perplexity AI, Anthropic Claude and more for recommendations, optimizing your website for searches just on Google is no longer adequate. Uncover how to prepare and optimize for AI driven discovery. In this session you will learn how buyer search behavior is rapidly evolving with the rise of generative AI and what that means for partner differentiation and digital visibility. We will explore how you can redesign your web presence to be emotionally resonant, technically optimized, and AI-search friendly. You will learn how to: â€¢ Align your website structure and content with the way AI engines index and rank results â€¢ Optimize your SEO for both traditional and AI-driven search models â€¢ Differentiate your offering through content strategy, metadata, and persona alignment â€¢ Understand the new rules of discoverability across chat-based interfaces and LLMs â€¢ Apply neuroscience-based messaging techniques to boost engagement and clarity This session provides a practical, research-backed roadmap to future-proof your digital presence. Whether you are refreshing your site, running lead generation campaigns, or trying to stand out in a competitive market you will leave with actionable insights and examples you can implement immediately.

title: Getting Started with AI (Vibe) Coding in Business Central
description: Ready to code at the speed of thought? In this 105-minute hands-on workshop, you'll explore Vibe coding with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and discover how to progressively build your AI collaboration skills from basic prompting to advanced agentic workflows. We'll start with a reality check: what can AI do with no guidance? Then we'll work through a practical progression that changes how you collaborate with AI. You'll learn to use AI as a planning partner before jumping into code, master the art of crafting and refining instructions that get better results, and explore role-based AI personas that match your expertise level. Through guided hands-on exercises using a familiar Contoso-style BC project, you'll build real extensions while learning sustainable AI adoption patterns. We'll cover environment setup, AL code generation techniques, and most importantly - how to train your AI to get better at helping you over time. What you'll learn: â€¢ How AI collaboration evolves from basic prompting to strategic partnership â€¢ Practical techniques for using AI to plan your development work â€¢ The art of crafting and iteratively improving AI instructions â€¢ Role-based AI approaches for different experience levels â€¢ Real-world integration of AI tools into your BC development workflow

title: Github Copilot: A practical approach to AL in 10+1 tips and tricks
description: In this session we will share with you how to make Github Copilot an ally in your development with AL. A practical and enjoyable approach in which with 10+1 tips and tricks you can start taking advantage of Github Copilot from scratch.

title: Global, Streamlined, Privacy-Focused: Electronic Banking Powered by AI
description: Our Electronic Banking solution implements a consistent workflow for payment processing and bank statement settlement, with seamless integration across multiple banks and countries. Backed by 20 years of continuous development, our app offers: > Global workflow that remains standardized across banks and countries while ensuring compliance with local requirements. > Streamlined processes, including built-in AI-accelerated settlement, to help companies drive automation and eliminate manual effort. > Data privacy focus - we don't process customer data. Help your customers standardize international banking with less customization and reduced risk. Join us for a live demo showcasing the full flow from payment run to transaction settlement, and leave with a reusable storyline for your customers. More about IT.integro apps on: IT.integro.pl/en/

title: Handyman Field Service Management - Opportunities for Partners and Customers
description: Experience Handyman Field Service Management Software live: from installing the app via AppSource to configuring it in minutes and connecting Business Central with your mobile workforce. See how customers benefit from powerful features such as service management, time registration, maintenance planning, resource planning and route optimization. At the same time, discover how partners can extend their portfolio, resell, or implement Handyman FSM - creating new business opportunities while helping customers unlock efficiency and digital transformation.

title: Hello Copilot - Are we going too fast?
description: The rate of development of AI in particular and indeed Copilot has been phenomenal over the last couple of years and the productivity gains significant. But are we going to fast? The session will weigh up the productivity gains and advancements against the inherent risks that come with them. We will take a step back and consider other factors such as security, reputational and most important of all the human factor which may be lost in the rush to stay ahead of the technology, and what steps can be taken to mitigate these additional risks.

title: Help your customers take control of business spending with eRequest.
description: eRequest utilises the power of Microsoft Teams to help businesses streamline purchasing and requisition, stay compliant, improve procurement efficiency, and get real-time insights into spending. Are your employees buying supplies from different vendors at different prices? Are you trying to set rules and procedures for procurement to control costs and prevent rogue purchases? nolan's eRequest solution gives you visibility into spending and helps you improve procurement as a whole. Make Procurement More Efficient eRequest automates manual approval workflows, routing requests to the right stakeholders, eliminating bottlenecks, and introducing a scalable requisition process. No matter how complex your approval structure, this tool will handle growing data volumes and organise procurement operations across your entire workforce. Plug Spending Leaks By ensuring employees buy only from approved vendors, you can cut cost and gain better governance over spending. eRequest streamlines your requisition process and enforces purchasing rules so there's no chance of error or risk of employees using unapproved funds. Make Smarter Financial Decisions nolan's eRequest tool gives you a holistic picture of your procurement operation, highlighting spending patterns and areas for improvement. Insight into your requisition and purchasing processes allows you to make changes so you can better control costs and configure the right rules about requests, vendors, procedures, and more.

title: Hey Azure DevOps users! Let's talk about GitHub - DeepDive
description: If you are Azure DevOps user, with recent changes around GitHub and Copilot, it is time to review the differences between Azure DevOps and GitHub and talk about possible co-existence. - What is the price? - What you will get? - Are there tools to migrate? - What you will loose or gain? - Should you migrate or not? We will try to answer not only these questions for you.

title: How one of Scandinavia's biggest taxi company evolved their marketing with Dataflows & Dataverse
description: Running a taxi company isn't just about getting people from A to Bâ€”it's a high-speed, data-driven balancing act. Think about it: You have thousands of cars moving in real-time. Customers who expect instant service (but also the best price). Traffic jams, flight delays, last-minute cancellations... and yes, that one customer who orders a taxi, then vanishes into thin air. Now, imagine trying to predict where demand will spike, making sure the right taxis are in the right placesâ€”before customers even realize they need a ride. That's exactly what one of Scandinavia's largest taxi companies set out to do. In this session, we'll show you how they leveraged Dynamics 365 Sales & Insights Journeys, combined with travel data from a Google database and Business Central, to revolutionize their customer engagement. You'll learn: * How to use Dataflows combined with Dataverse-apps - ensuring the best communication at the right time with Insights Journeys. * Also how we optimized data syncing with incremental updates - avoiding unnecessary data overload and ensuring efficiency. * How you can apply these strategies to your own customers - whether in transportation or any other industry where timing is key. Join this session to see how data, automation, and smart integrations can take customer engagement to the next level!

title: How to Build a Customer-Centric Sales & Marketing Engine with Dynamics 365
description: Everyone talks about customer centricity â€” but how do you actually build it into your sales and marketing processes? In this session, we'll show you how to create a scalable, customer-centric sales & marketing engine using Dynamics 365 and the Power Platform â€” aligned with Microsoft's priorities and partner best practices.
